title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.196 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.196 - Definition

State Regulations

The term local public health epidemiologist shall mean a person who investigates the occurrence of disease, injury or other health-related conditions or events in populations to describe the distribution of disease or risk factors for disease occurrence for the purpose of population-based prevention and control.
